text: “allāh (tamanṭa) daruvan æti kara gattēya” yayi ovun pavasannāha. ohu nam (mema kiyamanen) itāmat pariśuddhavantayeki. tavada ahashida, bhūmiyehida æti (siyalla) ohuṭa ayiti dæyayi! mē siyalla ohuṭa yaṭahat pahat vī kaṭayutu karanavā (misa, daruvan bavaṭa pat kara gannā taram sudusu kisivak næta)
